author: Sorcha Pollak
title: Irish couple finally home after weeks stranded in Peru
description: Retired GP says they were unable to fly from Cusco because he had contracted Covid-19
content:
A retired Irish doctor who has been stranded in Peru with his wife since early March and who contracted Covid-19 while in Latin America has arrived back in Dublin. 
Dr Ian Lindsay and his wife Mary McCarron managed to fly from Cusco to Lima at the weekend an… [+2246 chars]
